title: First tiny product
content:
I shipped my first tiny product: a single-page tool with one button and one outcome. The goal was to practice charging money, not building a platform.

Payment flow used Stripe Checkout, state lived in SQLite, and emails were plain text. Users appreciated the focus; I appreciated learning the full loop in days instead of months.

That win set the tone for future releases: small, paid, and shippable.
